name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-image-creator
title: Image Creator / Generator
shortDescription: This sample allows the user to enter a prompt into a copilot and then it generates an image based on the prompt using the Azure OpenAI Service Dalle-3 model.
longDescription: This sample allows the user to enter a prompt into a copilot and then it generates an image based on the prompt using the Azure OpenAI Service Dalle-3 model.

references.name: Microsoft Power Platform documentation
references.description: Discover how to make the most of Microsoft Power Platform products with online training courses, docs, and videos covering product capabilities and how-to guides.

references.name: Visual Studio connected service
references.description: Developers can use Connected Services within Visual Studio to create custom connectors. Connected Services is a collection of tools in Visual Studio that help you connect to services.
